column2: First Podium for @robinfrijns1 in his @dtm_pics career  and the best Team result so far this season. Today were heading for the second night race in Misano, stay tuned! #TeamABT #robinfrijns #dtm #nightrace #misano #ABT #audisport
Now live: the first ever @dtm_pics race at night #dtm #motorsport #racing #misano

One-two finish for @lucasdigrassi and @daniel_abt in New York. Looking forward to the final race today. Title in the teams classification still possible so keep on pushing guys  #ABT #fiaformulae #newyork #racing

MATTIAS EKSTRM IST DTM-VIZECHAMPIONDie DTM-Fans haben am Finalwochenende in Hockenheim eine dramatische Titelentscheidung erlebt. Mattias Ekstrm aus dem Audi Sport Team Abt Sportsline beendet die Saison als Vizechampion. MATTIAS EKSTRM FINISHES DTM AS RUNNER-UPDTM fans experienced a thrilling final weekend and title decider of DTM at Hockenheim. Mattias Ekstrm from Audi Sport Team Abt Sportsline finishes the season as runner-up.
Teamwork makes the dream work! Let's make it a day for history, @mattiasekstromracing and @nico.mueller51! Final #dtm race of the season is live from 15:15hrs with Mattias Ekstrm as points leader
This day ten years ago this man clinched his second @dtm_pics title. Can @mattiasekstromracing make history again this weekend ... #dtm
#hockenheimring #ekstrm #dtm #abt #abtsportsline #teamabt Schaut Euch das Rennen live in der ARD am Samstag um 14.30 Uhr und Sonntag 15:00 Uhr an! Unsere Vorfreude ist riesig! Eure auch?
